name: Sarwar
text: When the inevitable event comes,

name: Sarwar
text: no soul will deny its coming.

name: Sarwar
text: It will abase some and exalt others.

name: Sarwar
text: When the earth is violently shaken

name: Sarwar
text: and the mountains crumbled,

name: Sarwar
text: they will become like dust scattered around.

name: Sarwar
text: On that day, you (mankind) will be divided into three groups:

name: Sarwar
text: The people of the right hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their right hands. How happy they will be!

name: Sarwar
text: The people of the left hand - those whose books of records will be placed in their left hands. How miserable they will be!

name: Sarwar
text: The foremost ones (in faith and virtue) - the foremost ones in receiving their reward.

name: Sarwar
text: (The foremost ones) will be the nearest ones to God

name: Sarwar
text: in the beautiful Paradise.

name: Sarwar
text: Many of them will be from the ancient people

name: Sarwar
text: and only a few of them from the later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: They will recline on jewelled couches

name: Sarwar
text: facing one another.

name: Sarwar
text: Immortal youths will serve them

name: Sarwar
text: with goblets, jugs and cups of crystal clear wine

name: Sarwar
text: which will not cause them any intoxication or illness.

name: Sarwar
text: Also, they will be served with the fruits of their choice

name: Sarwar
text: and the flesh of birds, as they desire.

name: Sarwar
text: They will have maidens with large, lovely black and white eyes,

name: Sarwar
text: like pearls preserved in their shells,

name: Sarwar
text: as reward for their deeds.

name: Sarwar
text: They will not hear any unnecessary or sinful talk

name: Sarwar
text: except each other's greetings of, "Peace be with you".

name: Sarwar
text: As for the people of the right hand, how happy they will be!

name: Sarwar
text: They will live amid the thornless lot trees

name: Sarwar
text: and banana trees,

name: Sarwar
text: with fruits piled up one on the other,

name: Sarwar
text: and amid the extended shade

name: Sarwar
text: near to flowing water

name: Sarwar
text: and abundant fruits,

name: Sarwar
text: undiminished and never denied

name: Sarwar
text: and the noble maidens

name: Sarwar
text: that We have created (for the people of the right hand).

name: Sarwar
text: We have made them virgins,

name: Sarwar
text: loving and of equal age.

name: Sarwar
text: These (people of the right hand) consist of many from the ancient

name: Sarwar
text: and many from the later generations.

name: Sarwar
text: As for the people on the left hand, how miserable they will be!

name: Sarwar
text: They will live amid the scorching,

name: Sarwar
text: scalding water and under a shadow of black smoke,

name: Sarwar
text: neither cold nor graceful in shape.

name: Sarwar
text: They had lived in luxury before this

name: Sarwar
text: and persisted in heinous sins.

name: Sarwar
text: It was they who said, "Shall we be resurrected after we die and have turned into dust and bones?

name: Sarwar
text: Will our ancient forefathers be resurrected too?

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), say, "All the ancient and later generations

name: Sarwar
text: will be brought together for an appointment on an appointed day.

name: Sarwar
text: Then you people who had gone astray and rejected the Truth

name: Sarwar
text: will eat from the fruit of the tree of Zaqqum,

name: Sarwar
text: filling your bellies, with it

name: Sarwar
text: and on top of this you will drink boiling water

name: Sarwar
text: like a thirsty camel".

name: Sarwar
text: Such will be their dwelling on the Day of Judgment.

name: Sarwar
text: It is We who have created you. Why then did you not testify to the Truth?

name: Sarwar
text: Have you seen sperm?

name: Sarwar
text: Did you create it or was it We who created it?

name: Sarwar
text: We have destined death for you and no one can challenge Us

name: Sarwar
text: in replacing you with another creation like you, changing you into a form which you do not know.

name: Sarwar
text: You certainly knew about (your) first development. Why do you not take heed?

name: Sarwar
text: Have you seen what you sow?

name: Sarwar
text: Do you make it grow or is it We who make it grow?

name: Sarwar
text: Had We wanted, We could have crushed it to bits and you would have been left to lament,

name: Sarwar
text: crying, "We have been left to suffer loss.

name: Sarwar
text: Surely, we have been deprived (of the benefits)".

name: Sarwar
text: Have you seen the water which you drink?

name: Sarwar
text: Is it you who sent it down from the clouds or is it We who have sent it down?

name: Sarwar
text: Had We wanted, We could have made it salty. Why then do you not give thanks?

name: Sarwar
text: Have you seen the fire which you kindle?

name: Sarwar
text: Is it you who have produced its tree or is it We who have produced it?

name: Sarwar
text: It is We who have made it as a reminder and a means of comfort for the people.

name: Sarwar
text: (Muhammad), glorify your Lord, the Great One.

name: Sarwar
text: I do not need to swear by the setting of the stars

name: Sarwar
text: - which is indeed a great oath if only you knew it -

name: Sarwar
text: that this is an honorable Quran

name: Sarwar
text: preserved in a hidden Book which

name: Sarwar
text: no one can touch it except the purified ones.

name: Sarwar
text: (This Quran) is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Sarwar
text: Would you say that this statement is a lie?

name: Sarwar
text: Would you reject the sustenance that you receive rather than give thanks?

name: Sarwar
text: Why can you not help a soul dying

name: Sarwar
text: right before your very eyes?

name: Sarwar
text: We are closer to him than you, but you cannot see.

name: Sarwar
text: If you are true to your claim that there is no Day of Judgment,

name: Sarwar
text: why can you not bring it (the soul) back (to life)?

name: Sarwar
text: (If a dying soul) is of those near to God,

name: Sarwar
text: it will have rest, happiness, and a beautiful Paradise.

name: Sarwar
text: If it is of the people of the right hand,

name: Sarwar
text: it will be with the people of the right hand, living in peace and security.

name: Sarwar
text: If it is of those who have rejected the Truth and have gone astray,

name: Sarwar
text: its dwelling will be boiling water

name: Sarwar
text: and the heat of hell fire.

name: Sarwar
text: This is the absolute Truth and certainty.

name: Sarwar
text: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Great One.
